Ordered the Ninja burger w ice-cream but after finishing the meal got to join the long queue of people placing their orders just to collect the ice-cream.  What stupid system is this? Is big M expecting their customers to collect their ice-creams together with their meals and have melted ice-cream afterwards or not have ice-cream at all. Worse still, there were 2 crew members waiting for the food to be ready to serve to waiting customers and they just stand there waiting and refusing to serve me my ice-creams which were ordered earlier. Are the big M managers nuts in insisting their customers to queue up twice for the same order with their other crew members stand idle while the cashier is busy taking order?

Just tried it. The taste is ruined by the coconut chicken patty - the coconut flavour doesn’t go well with the sauce.

The only thing ninja about this burger is the color. Come on, Mc, you are not even trying! Seriously? Nothing remotely japanese about this burger at all. I feel like I was eating a lousier version of the nasi lemak burger. Please reinvent this burger and do it some justice. Maybe do a taste test before selling it.
It’s taste exactly like nasi lemak burger. The sauce cant even cover up the coconut taste. It’s a 👎🏽 for me.

I think the description for the chicken patty should be changed to “Crispy *leftover-nasi-lemak-burger-patty* whole chicken thigh” instead. Also, I don’t think the Nanban sauce was actually able to mask the coconut taste from the chicken patty. Quite disappointing man Macs 😠 Frau Pearl

This has got to be the worst burger I've ever tasted from Macs. What is this trying to accomplish? Is this a dessert? IT'S A REALLY SWEET BURGER I'M SO CONFUSED. Gonna stick with mcspicy from now on. You're not losing a customer, just my confidence in you

The one I had I could not see the white cabbage at all - they are playing ninja in the white sauce. Don't think I recall eating any cucumber then - was trying to figure out where the cabbages are. Still prefer the samurai.

I had this at Kovan McDonald's. Don't know why but the chicken has coconut flavor in it. Maybe they used the chicken meant for nasi lemak burger? Or was it meant to be the same? Anyway, the burger didn't work for me, pls don't bring it back again and please make the samurai burger a staple on the menu!

5.post_text:
Share these triumphant 1-for-1 deals with your fellow warriors today! Limited time only.

*Visuals are for illustration purposes only. Available only after breakfast hours, while stocks last. Promotion is only applicable to ala-carte purchase, and free item is only applicable to same item purchased. Promotion is not valid at Gardens by the Bay, iFly Singapore, LIDO, Resort World Sentosa, NTU, NUS, Singapore Polytechnic and Temasek Polytechnic. Products may be flavoured. For more information on product and allergens, visit mcdonalds.com.sg/justforyouSG

comments.message:
At bedok Mall branch today. Bought a hot fudge sundae. Was almost finishing when I spit out something that's not supposed to be in my hot fudge sundae.  What's worse than finding a fly in your soup,  in my case ice cream, it's finding it in your mouth. 

Typical,  when you present it the evidence  the assistant  manager, Imelda,  instead of being sympathetic, started defending about having no houseflies in the outlet. Now,  I'm not saying u intentionally put it in.  Accidents can happen,  when it does,  take responsibility and take care of the customer first.  Why should I have to go teaching you how to do business? 

Should I suffer from any food-poisoning,  I will reserve my right to seek compensation.  

I've been patronising McDonald's for over 30 years.  I know there are NO houseflies to be seen. (edited for error)

It's not my job to find out how it got there but McDonald's better be giving me a satisfactory answer and not like how Imelda was squashing the insect,  seemingly trying to destroy evidence.  

Now, never will I enter McDonald's again. 

And for the time being,  please don't serve the ice cream or hot fudge.  It so disgusted me I threw up all the food I consumed earlier.
My samurai burger via McDelivery was a mayo burger 🍔. Wasn't the patty supposed to be covered in teriyaki sauce? Messaged them yesterday and no response at all. Tsk.
Really disappointed from ur service. today i went down to CCK lot1 order 6pcs nuggets meal when i reach home i find out didnt give me my fries, wonder how u train ur staff😡😡

Bought a Samurai Burger meal upsized today and i can say for sure i will not be buying anymore meals from Mcdonald in the near future, the Samurai Burger have no Sauce on it, i thought i had bought a mayo sandwich instead.
Mc donald quality has no control...its getting worst....n now i think malaysia has better quality then singapore....wat a disappointment!
Just checking...will u guys be bringing in these Tomica cars for d next promo....?
Please open a Mcdonald at Kensington Square!!
i hope tis on the menu all days long 365 beyound

Could it be absorbed by the buns? Nope.. I been trying to figure out where is the sauce??!! Basically the burger is plain n dry w/o any sauce on it? Please enlighten me where is the sauce??!!!!
severely under-packed fries, annoyed and disappointed.

Can you remind you staff to give out shaker fries for upsized meals?? Monday at Jurong Point i ordered and they didnt gave me, luckily i checked before leaving. Wednesday at pioneer mall, i ordered again but didnt check and upon arriving home i realized shaker fries was missing. Oh my god, you know how disappointing it is to realized that when you purposely make a trip down to buy mcdonalds for seaweed fries but not receive any??? 😞

Your macdelivery is always late and does not even give a call informing us your guys will be late and worst of all the food are all cold. Ended up still need to wait 1 hour for you food totally I need to wait for 3 hours just to eat your breakfast and worst I am rushing out. Ended up my whole day ruin because of your so called 'Good' service.

I ordered takeaway and upsized my meals for the shaker fries but the powder packet was not given for my fries. Also, look at the miserable pack of fries I received. It looks only half filled. What's the point of me paying more to upsize if it's just a larger packaging provided?😡
